Created an attachment (id=66478)
additional patch

The patch adds two missing change labels that are visible in the undo history of the 'Extract local' and 'Extract constant' quick fix

Changed ChangeCorrectionProposal.getDisplayString() to use getName() everywhere.

A minor issue is that the names of ChangeCorrectionProposal are in sentence case, so the Undo and Redo menu strings can become non-titlecase. I've fixed this for the new Extract Local and Extract Constant strings (which are different from the proposal name).

Release to HEAD.
